title: Does a Photo Show Rep. Boebert With Insurrectionists on US Capitol Steps?
subtitle: This is not the first controversy to surround U.S. Rep. Lauren Boebert since the U.S. Capitol riot.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photograph shows U.S. Rep. Lauren Boebert with a group of insurrectionists on the steps of the U.S. Capitol the day before the Jan. 6 riot.
